channel.title: Changing save preferences?
channel.description: Hey, I am the creator of Avbscape (Awesome server!! ;D) and everything works fine EXCEPT the saving stuff. It doesn't save enough and it doesn't save when players log off only every 60 seconds or so. This normally wouldn't be a problem since I put warnings in the logout tab but some REALLY ANNOYING PEOPLE don't read shit when they play my server and items are lost when they log off and the server hasn't saved. Can someone please tell me what I need to change to make it save like every 30 seconds and when people log off?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2007, 09:11:49 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Changing save preferences?
item.dc:creator: @Slappa4 Slappa4
item.description:
@Slappa4 wrote:

Hey, I am the creator of Avbscape (Awesome server!! ;D) and everything works fine EXCEPT the saving stuff. It doesn’t save enough and it doesn’t save when players log off only every 60 seconds or so. This normally wouldn’t be a problem since I put warnings in the logout tab but some REALLY ANNOYING PEOPLE don’t read shit when they play my server and items are lost when they log off and the server hasn’t saved. Can someone please tell me what I need to change to make it save like every 30 seconds and when people log off?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2007, 09:11:49 PM[/size][hr]bump
